name: Dark Side of Balloon
description:
A family accidentally fills their children's birthday balloons with hellium instead of helium. The balloons are buoyant and ready for battle!

Created during Train Jam 2018!

Team

Jerry Belich - @j3rrytron - Game Designer

Mike Enoch - @mikeenoch - Programmer

Cameron Pinard - @cinnamonjesus - Technical Artist

Izzy Gramp - @shrubette - Illustrator

Elie Abraham - @elieabraham64 - Music
